title: Whitechapel Road, A Vampyre Tale
description: Born in the south of England in 1854, Aremis thought his life was laid out from the very beginning. But that was all to change. Expecting to meet his wife-to-be at the annual harvest festival, Aremis has no idea that the evening would bring forth an evil far beyond his comprehension. Nursed back to health by his sister Temperance, the terrifying truth begins to unfold and he is forced to leave his home in the hope of finding answers within the city of London. There on the shadowy back streets of the city's east end, he finds himself at the heart of an ancient curse. Drawn into playing a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a stranger, he quickly discovers that they, may be the only one who can explain the strange events that have besieged him. Haunted by nightmares and conflicting moral issues, he is propelled towards an unbelievable confrontation, one that will find him in the center of the most horrific string of murders in London's history.
author: Wayne Mallows
